name: Heart Knight
description:
Your valiant unicorn mount
has fallen. You make a deal
with a demon to resurrect
your friend.

Offer your health as
sacrifice and slain enemies
to gain it back.

Created for Ludum Dare 44 Jam.

Play on emulator or on real Game Boy.

Credits:

Samuli Jääskeläinen (Code)

Jari Miranda (Art)

MP83 (Art)
